Hero.title: Hi, I'm Dominik
Hero.description: I am a 17-year-old programming student. Based in the Czech Republic, I focus on web development, Swift & SwiftUI applications, game development, and vector graphics.

Hero.title: Websites perfectly tailored to your needs.
Hero.description: Forget slow WordPress. I build modern websites that are lightning-fast, secure, and ready to represent your brand.

Features.designDesc: No templates. Unique custom visuals that match your brand and set you apart.
Features.speedDesc: Statically generated pages that load instantly and are loved by search engines.
Features.securityDesc: Database-free architecture. Your website is practically unhackable.

Admin.title: Administration you will
Admin.description: Forget complex systems and manuals. You get a custom-tailored studio where you can make edits in seconds. Fully localized and intuitive.

Pricing.title: Cheaper than you'd expect.
Pricing.subtitle: Agency quality at a fraction of the cost. No hidden fees, you know exactly what you're paying for. Prices are estimated and might change.

cardVizitka.title: Portfolio
cardVizitka.description: Ideal for startups, personal portfolios, or simple service presentations.

cardFirma.title: Business
cardFirma.description: Complete presentation for companies wanting to build trust and gain customers.

Maintenance.title: Worry-Free Website.
Maintenance.subtitle: With my maintenance plan, I guarantee your site runs like clockwork technically, so you can focus on what truly matters.

cardMain.title: Web Maintenance
cardMain.description: A website isn't a printed flyer; it's software. I handle the hosting, security, and full compatibility. You don't have to worry about a thing.

cardInfo.title: Why pay for maintenance?
cardInfo.descriptionPart1: Technology changes constantly. Maintenance covers server costs and my background work, ensuring
cardInfo.descriptionPart2: your site never becomes obsolete or goes down.
cardInfo.descriptionPart3: The price also includes minor code edits and website adjustments.

Legal.title: How does billing work?
Legal.descriptionPart1: I am a student, so cooperation takes place via
Legal.descriptionPart3: . For your company, this is a tax-deductible expense and the simplest administrative route (a simple one-page contract I will prepare).

Contact.description: Whether you have a finished assignment or just a rough idea, write to me. Consultation is free and non-binding.

ContactPage.description: Interested in my work? Fill out the form and I'll get back to you. Consultation of your idea is non-binding and free.

inputs.name: Name
inputs.placeholder: Briefly describe your project or inquiry...

ContactPage.successDesc: Thanks for reaching out. I'll get back to your email as soon as possible, usually within 24 hours.
